name: chicagotribune
text:
Chicago mom D’Asia Hervey didn’t want to bring her baby to a protest, but her own mom, who has raised three black sons, persuaded her.

name: chicagotribune
text:

“We’re actively at work identifying the officers responsible for that.” https://t.co/vmvEiKD8yY

name: chicagotribune
text:
